ttworkbench.play.parameters.ipv6.components.messaging.components

Class MessageBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • ttworkbench.play.parameters.ipv6.components.messaging.components.MessageBlock

  • public class MessageBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    Groups several MessageLabel objects. Discriminates between tagged messages and not tagged messages. If a message has a tag, a prior message with the same tag will be replaced while adding this new message. Otherwise messages simple be added to the block.
    Author:
    Johannes Dahlke
